# SEMsens

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SEMsens is to perform sensitivity analysis for structural equation modeling against a potential missing confounder.

## Installation

You can install the released version of SEMsens from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("SEMsens")
```

## Example

Please see vignettes for examples about how to use the package.
